title: HTML Tags - 2
description: Further important HTML tags and their uses.

cards.a: The <ol> tag creates an ordered (numbered) list.
The <li> tag defines a list item within <ul>, <ol>, or <menu> elements.

cards.q: What is the function of the <form> tag?
cards.a: The <form> tag is used to create an HTML form for user input.
The <input> tag specifies a field where users can enter data.

cards.q: What does the <button> tag do in a webpage?
cards.a: The <button> tag creates a clickable button.

cards.q: What is the purpose of the <table> tag?
cards.a: The <table> tag is used to create tables for displaying tabular data.
The <tr> tag defines a row in a table.
The <td> tag defines a cell within a table row.
The <th> tag defines a header cell in a table.
The <iframe> tag is used to embed another HTML page within the current page.
